property.name: mapreduce.job.max.runtime.mins
property.description: maximum expected runtime of apps in minutes

property.name: mapreduce.job.max.runtime.mins.enforce
property.description: If true vulture kills the violators

property.name: mapreduce.map.max.runtime.mins
property.description: maximum expected runtime of mappers in minutes

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.max.runtime.mins
property.description: maximum expected runtime of reducers in minutes

property.name: vulture.task.progress.threshold
property.description: the threshold for progress lagged behind

property.name: vulture.newAppChecker.interval.sec
property.description: The interval in seconds between each two invocation of vulture

property.name: vulture.confCache.max.size
property.description: maximum size of the cache for app configurations

property.name: vulture.progressCache.max.size
property.description: maximum size of the cache for tasks' progress

property.name: vulture.newAppChecker.concurrency
property.description: Number of concurrent threads checking on apps

property.name: vulture.dryRun
property.description: In dry-run mode no task/job is killed

property.name: vulture.admin.email
property.description: admin will be notified for each policy violation

property.name: vulture.user.emails
property.description: list of comma separated users to be notified instead of the job submitter.

property.name: vulture.notify.user
property.description: if true, the job submitter will also receive a notification email after each policy violation

property.name: vulture.cc.email
property.description: list of comma separated email that will be copied in the sent notifications

property.name: vulture.web.port
property.description: The web port to be used by the web service
